summary: Implements a logger that connects PyTorch Lightning training runs with the Weights & Biases platform. It creates and configures a W&B run, records metrics, hyperparameters, model graphs, gradients, and various media types, and automatically logs checkpoint artifacts. The logger supports both online and offline operation and provides utilities for artifact download and run configuration management.
